text: Ia faraghɨvɨra dagher bar aghuibara isɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ofa damigh gɨvagh, dagher nar igharaziba, ia dar amɨ, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzim ian ikian kogham. Egh ia faragh na bagh ofa damighan kogh, egh mati ia ofan Israelia God ganɨngizir kabagh amizɨ, da Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze. Ia kamaghɨn damightɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God ia mɨsoghɨrarigham.”
